Definitions: Specifies the individual or entity to whom the Environmental Site Assessment report is directed, usually a stakeholder such as an investor, lender, or regulatory body
Indicates whether Recognized Environmental Conditions (RECs) are involved in the environmental assessment (Y for Yes, N for No) and specifies the monetary value associated with them
The specific physical location where the Environmental Site Assessment is conducted, typically where the project or property is located
The date on which the Environmental Site Assessment report is finalized and issued
The date on which the lease for the site where the assessment is conducted or the project is located becomes effective
The start date of the lease agreement for the property involved in the Environmental Site Assessment

Key Items: Date of Field Work Completed on ESA
Definitions: The date on which all field work required for the Environmental Site Assessment was completed at the site
